answers.answer: Well that's good that's all it was :) I work at my OBs office so it's so hard to wait for them to call me with results, I'm not allowed to look at my own :/

question: so I have my 1 hour glucose rest on Friday Feb 22.. And my doctor told me she will call if there was a positive and if it was a negative, I wasn't gone hear from her.. Well today her nurse called me.. So my first reaction was omg! I have gestational diabetes, and she said no, your NEGATIVE for that, but your iron was low.. Thanking the man above always, so she told me to go pick up some iron pills and tame those with my prenatal pills..
title: "update"
